Desc.entry: Member of the Chartered Society of Physiotherapy, Member of the British Acupuncture Council, registered general nurse, lecturer in physiotherapy, manipulation and acupuncture. Provides physiotherapy and acupuncture services for musculo-skeletal and systemic problems. Also provides medico-legal reports with reference to whiplash and negligence claims. Professional fee for BUPA, WPA, PPP, Westfield, HSA and self-paying patients is £39 per session. Professional fee for fee-paying patients, consultation and treatment £39 per session. Please contact for details of up-to-date prices. Recognised by Westfield Contributory Health Scheme and HSA.
